Paper 2.stem: In the diagram, ABCD is a rectangle. Given that $AB=(2x+y)$ cm, $BC=(x+y)$ cm, $CD=(3x+5y+3)$ cm and $AD=(4x+5y-7)$ cm.
Paper 2.diagramDescription: Rectangle ABCD with side lengths given as algebraic expressions.

parts.questionText: Find the values of x and y.

Paper 2.title: Simultaneous Equations Rectangle
